description: '''Omer Adam''' ({{Langx|he| עומר אדם}}; born October 22, 1993) is an [[Israelis|Israeli]] singer whose music fuses elements of [[Mizrahi music]] (a type of [[Middle Eastern music]]) with Western [[Pop music|pop]] instrumentation. In 2023, [[Ynetnews]] named Adam "Israel's most famous singer".
